verses.verse: Thus all the work <WH4399> that SHlomo <WH8010> made <WH6213> <WH8804> for the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> was finished <WH7999> <WH8799>: and SHlomo <WH8010> brought <WH935> <WH8686> in all the things <WH6944> that David <WH1732> his father <WH1> had dedicated <WH6944>; and the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and all the instruments <WH3627>, put <WH5414> <WH8804> he among the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

Then SHlomo <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> <WH8686> the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and all the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294>, the chief <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, unto Yerushalayim <WH3389>, to bring up <WH5927> <WH8687> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> out of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, which is TZiyon <WH6726>.
Wherefore all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> assembled <WH6950> <WH8735> themselves unto the king <WH4428> in the feast <WH2282> which was in the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>.
And all the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8799>; and the L'vi'im <WH3881> took up <WH5375> <WH8799> the ark <WH727>.

And they brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> the ark <WH727>, and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and all the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that were in the tabernacle <WH168>, these did the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881> bring up <WH5927> <WH8689>.

Also king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010>, and all the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that were assembled <WH3259> <WH8737> unto him before <WH6440> the ark <WH727>, sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8764> sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241>, which could not be told <WH5608> <WH8735> nor numbered <WH4487> <WH8735> for multitude <WH7230>.

And the Kohanim <WH3548> brought in <WH935> <WH8686> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> unto his place <WH4725>, to the oracle <WH1687> of the house <WH1004>, into the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place, even under the wings <WH3671> of the cherubims <WH3742>:

For the cherubims <WH3742> spread forth <WH6566> <WH8802> their wings <WH3671> over the place <WH4725> of the ark <WH727>, and the cherubims <WH3742> covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the ark <WH727> and the staves <WH905> thereof above <WH4605>.

And they drew out <WH748> <WH8686> the staves <WH905> of the ark, that the ends <WH7218> of the staves <WH905> were seen <WH7200> <WH8735> from the ark <WH727> before <WH6440> the oracle <WH1687>; but they were not seen <WH7200> <WH8735> without <WH2351>. And there it is unto this day <WH3117>.

There was nothing in the ark <WH727> save the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> which Mosheh <WH4872> put <WH5414> <WH8804> therein at Horev <WH2722>, when the YY <WH3068> made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when they came out <WH3318> <WH8800> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it came to pass, when the Kohanim <WH3548> were come out <WH3318> <WH8800> of the holy <WH6944> place: (for all the Kohanim <WH3548> that were present <WH4672> <WH8737> were sanctified <WH6942> <WH8694>, and did not then wait <WH8104> <WH8800> by course <WH4256>:

Also the L'vi'im <WH3881> which were the singers <WH7891> <WH8789>, all of them of Asaph <WH623>, of Heman <WH1968>, of Jeduthun <WH3038>, with their sons <WH1121> and their brethren <WH251>, being arrayed <WH3847> <WH8794> in white linen <WH948>, having cymbals <WH4700> and psalteries <WH5035> and harps <WH3658>, stood <WH5975> <WH8802> at the east end <WH4217> of the altar <WH4196>, and with them an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> Kohanim <WH3548> sounding <WH2690> <WH8688> with shofars <WH2689>:)

It came even to pass, as the trumKefas <WH2690> <WH8764> <WH8675> <WH2690> <WH8764> and singers <WH7891> <WH8789> were as one <WH259>, to make one <WH259> sound <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> <WH8687> in praising <WH1984> <WH8763> and thanking <WH3034> <WH8687> the YY <WH3068>; and when they lifted up <WH7311> <WH8687> their voice <WH6963> with the shofars <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> and instruments <WH3627> of musick <WH7892>, and praised <WH1984> <WH8763> the YY <WH3068>, saying, For he is good <WH2896>; for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>: that then the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> <WH8804> with a cloud <WH6051>, even the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>;

So that the Kohanim <WH3548> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not stand <WH5975> <WH8800> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> by reason <WH6440> of the cloud <WH6051>: for the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> had filled <WH4390> <WH8804> the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>.
